channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023101274
item.description:
Report X-2023101274

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-17T18:14:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-12
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND OPEN AND COMPLETELY DESTROYED. THE LEAKAGE WAS ABSORBED THROUGHOUT THE CARDBOARD BOX. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND INSIDE A NON-HAZARDOUS TOTE. THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX WAS ALSO DESTROYED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY HANDLED USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was on unload door 37 wet. The content's cap was loose, causing internal leakage DescribePack: The package became saturated with liquid causing to tear apart. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Absorbent pads was used to clean spill.

item.title: Report X-2023101025
item.description:
Report X-2023101025

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was sent out for delivery today to then be brought back to the station by the driver leaking inner contents outward. I immediately put the package in a container to prevent further spillage. DescribePack: Twist top on the side by the handle has a small crack, as well on the left-hand side at the bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was cleaned up and placed inside a hazmat drum.

item.title: Report X-2023100687
item.description:
Report X-2023100687

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100687 SequenceEvent: condenser coil cleaner had loose caps causing contents to leak out. DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: oil dry to clean up spill then picked the contaminated oil dry up. 2. X-2023100688 SequenceEvent: loose caps on jugs caused liquid to leak out DescribePack: loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: oil dry was used to soak up liquid then cleaned up oil dry. 3. X-2023100689 SequenceEvent: CONDENSOR COIL CLEANER HAD LOOSE CAPS CAUSING LIQUID TO LEAK OUT. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: OIL DRY WAS USED TO DRY LIQUID UP THEN CLEANED UP.

item.title: Report X-2023100655
item.description:
Report X-2023100655

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was in the process of being unloaded and it fell from a pallet that was stacked high. I immediately put the package into a hazmat drum and poured Amphomag on the area of the spill. DescribePack: The package had fallen on its side and leaked out the right side of the package and onto the floor of the trailer. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I cleaned the mess from the spill immediately and asked if there were any package handlers harmed, everyone said no.
